shouldSplitHand(Card, Card, Card) - Method in class Model.Players.StrategyPlay.AggressiveStrategy

shouldSplitHand(Card, Card, Card) - Method in class Model.Players.StrategyPlay.ConservativeStrategy
Fa split solo con Assi e 8, e solo quando il dealer ha una carta debole.

shouldTakeInsurance(int, Card) - Method in class Model.Players.StrategyPlay.ConservativeStrategy
